--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Stirling, Scott" <scott.stirling@w...> 
wrote:

> There have been so many posts to this email group between now and 
yesterday that I deleted a bunch without reading them.  Others may 
have done the same.  Not to mention we've had one original thread 
spawn into at least 3 other threads, which have been responsible for 
most of the traffic.
> 
> I'd suggest some folks should think more between posts or take a 
discussion offline until things are resolved, then come back with a 
summary.  But this is so unusual for this list (thinking over the 
past few years), it will probably return to normal soon by themselves.

I'd suggest some folks should possibly get an email client able to 
group mails by subject and then delete only those threads they aren't 
interested in. I do this, and I was interested in the thread you are 
probably referring to, so I am glad that it was on the list, not in 
private email.

But that's just me - I am known for my addicition to lengthy 
discussions... ;)

No hard feelings, Ilja
